00091 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00092  * Classes
00093  */
00094 
00099 class char_buffer_sink
00100 {
00101 public:
00103     typedef char_buffer_sink    class_type;
00105     typedef ff_char_t           char_type;
00107     typedef size_t              size_type;
00108 
00109 public:
00111     char_buffer_sink(size_type n, char_type* buffer)
00112         : m_capacity(n)
00113         , m_len(0)
00114         , m_buffer(buffer)
00115     {}
00116 #ifdef STLSOFT_CF_STATIC_ARRAY_SIZE_DETERMINATION_SUPPORT
00118     template <size_t N>
00119     char_buffer_sink(char_type (&ar)[N])
00120         : m_capacity(N)
00121         , m_len(0)
00122         , m_buffer(&ar[0])
00123     {}
00124 #endif /* STLSOFT_CF_STATIC_ARRAY_SIZE_DETERMINATION_SUPPORT */
00125 
00126 public: // Attributes
00128     size_type size() const
00129     {
00130         return m_len;
00131     }
00133     size_type capacity() const
00134     {
00135         return m_capacity;
00136     }
00137 
00138 public: // Operations
00140     class_type& write(size_type cchTotal, size_type numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results, int flags)
00141     {
00142         const ff_string_slice_t crlf            =   fastformat_getNewlineForPlatform();
00143 
00144         const size_type         requiredSize    =   size()
00145                                                     +   cchTotal
00146                                                     +   ((flags::ff_newLine & flags) ? crlf.len : 0)
00147                                                     ;
00148 
00149         if(requiredSize > capacity())
00150         {
00151             throw std::out_of_range("character buffer sink capacity exceeded");
00152         }
00153         else
00154         {
00155             char_type* p = &m_buffer[0] + size();
00156 
00157             // next we concatenate all the slices
00158 
00159             { for(size_type i = 0; i < numResults; ++i)
00160             {
00161                 ff_string_slice_t const& slice = results[i];
00162 
00163                 ::memcpy(p, slice.ptr, slice.len * sizeof(char_type));
00164                 p += slice.len;
00165             }}
00166 
00167             m_len += cchTotal;
00168 
00169             // then append the new line, if required
00170 
00171             if(flags::ff_newLine & flags)
00172             {
00173                 ::memcpy(p, crlf.ptr, crlf.len * sizeof(char_type));
00174                 p += crlf.len;
00175 
00176                 m_len += crlf.len;
00177             }
00178 
00179             FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_POSTCONDITION_STATE_APPL_LAYER(p == &m_buffer[0] + size(), "char_buffer sink writing logic failed: write pointer in wrong place");
00180         }
00181 
00182         return *this;
00183     }
00184 
00185 private: // Member variables
00186     const size_type     m_capacity;
00187     size_t              m_len;
00188     char_type* const    m_buffer;
00189 
00190 private: // Not to be implemented
00191     char_buffer_sink(class_type const&);
00192     class_type& operator =(class_type const&);
00193 };
00194 
00195 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00196  * Action Shims
00197  */
00198 
00204 inline char_buffer_sink& fmt_slices(char_buffer_sink& sink, int flags, size_t cchTotal, size_t numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results)
00205 {
00206     return sink.write(cchTotal, numResults, results, flags);
00207 }
